resources.string:
Welcome to FluVille!
As the mayor of FluVille, your job
is to keep your residents healthly
and reduce the spread of the flu
throughout the population.
CDC recommends a yearly flu vaccine as the first\nand most important step in protecting\nagainst flu viruses.
Washing your hands often will help\nprotect you from germs. If soap and water are not\navailable, use an alcohol-based hand rub.
Germs are often spread when a person\ntouches something that is contaminated with germs and\nthen touches his or her eyes, nose, or mouth.

If possible, stay home from work, school, and
errands when you are sick.
You will help prevent those around you
from getting sick.
People with flu can spread it to\nothers up to about 6 feet away.
